metadata.title: CVE-2018-18349 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Remote frame navigations was incorrectly permitted to local resources inBlink in Google Chrome prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed an attacker whoconvinced a user to install a malicious extension to access files on thelocal file system via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
